snippet: Dozens of men with machine guns and rifles marched into the town of Qandala, residents and officials said, opening another front in the battle between ISIS and the Shabab....

byline.contributor: Hussein Mohamed contributed reporting from Mogadishu, Somalia.

lead_paragraph: Dozens of men with machine guns and rifles marched into the town of Qandala, residents and officials said, opening another front in the battle between ISIS and the Shabab.

headline.main: ‘I’m Scared These Men Will Kill Everyone’: ISIS Takes a Somalia Town

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
